title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 26.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 26.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

Chapter 843 of the Laws of 1984 amended sections
158-b
and
401
(7)
of the Vehicle and Traffic Law to require
the department to provide "van pool" registration plates. The purpose of the
legislation is to provide a designated series of plates for vehicles utilized
in a van pool vehicle operation. Vehicles displaying van pool plates may be
able to qualify for special privileges which may be given to such vehicles such
as use of commuter lanes, commuter parking areas and gas
rationing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
26.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
